title: HoP 227 - Stayin’ Alive - Thirteenth Century Psychology
itunes:title: HoP 227 - Stayin’ Alive - Thirteenth Century Psychology
description: John Blund and William of Auvergne draw on Aristotle and Avicenna to argue that the soul is immaterial and immortal.
